name: HotHeads
description:
HotHeads

By HmanHere/BoltSquad

Created with a theme in mind of "Playing With Fire"

Jump through spikes, acid and enemies to get to a heater at the end of every level. Light the heater on fire and race back through the entire level with a fiery blaze chasing you.

Hotheads is a decently difficult game. Unskilled players may prepare to rage a little bit.

Controls:

[W] [Space] [Up-Arrow]: Jump
[A] [Left-Arrow]: Move Left
[D] [Right-Arrow]: Move Right
[E] [Enter]: Interact
[F]: Fullscreen
[M]: Mute Sounds

Spoilers:

Hotheads is a 10 level game with the last level being a fun challenging boss fight.

Discord:
https://discord.gg/DyNVWhKa

Thanks
